item.title: Deploy k8s Cluster Using kubespray
item.description: Introduction Nowadays, there’re couples of way to deploy a k8s cluster in various of form factors, from experimental cluster with a single node to production deployment with hundreds of servers. This memo is a note for deploy a ‘product’ k8s cluster using kubespray - limited by the resources for the experiment, no dedicated storage nodes provisioned, and the networking is not covered as well. Node Role Etcd External IP Internal IP node-101 Controller yes 192.
